thread.title: Lisa Haydon In Ae Dil Hai Mushkil?
thread.title_full: Lisa Haydon In Ae Dil Hai Mushkil?

title: Lisa Haydon In Ae Dil Hai Mushkil?
text:
Posted by: Vinod D'souza Published: Saturday, October 17, 2015, 14:04 [IST] 
Karan Johar's upcoming flick, Ae Dil Hai Mushkil, is turning out to be a big star-studded cast and the list of top actors is growing by the day. It is now reported that Lisa Haydon, is roped in to play a short and interesting role in the movie. 
The lead actors of Ae Dil Hai Mushkil are Ranbir Kapoor, Aishwarya Rai and Anushka Sharma. Karan Johar, then included Fawad Khan and Imran Abbas Naqvi from Pakistan. Sunny Leone too was roped in for a cameo appearance along with Ranbir Kapoor. It is also reported that Saif Ali Khan may play a role in the movie as well. 
Lisa Haydon, is currently in London for the last leg of Housefull 3. The actress rose to fame for her supporting role in the superhit movie Queen and went on to act in The Shaukeens. 
Lisa Haydon, would have an interesting and short role in Ae Dil Hai Mushkil and is the latest star to be roped in Karan Johar's Ae Dil Hai Mushkil. 
Ae Dil Hai Mushkil, would see Aishwarya Rai and Anushka Sharma play the role of siblings. The team is currently shooting in Vienna, after wrapping up the shoot in Paris for a song.
